messages.msgSnippet: Hi Bonnie... I don t know if you re still looking for info re: Pre-Paid Legal, and if Judi is not a rep I am, and you can check into the membership via my
messages.messageBody:
Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 1069 Hi Bonnie... I don't know if you're still looking for info re: Pre-Paid Legal, and if Judi is not a rep I am, and you can check into the membership via my website if you like at:

www.prepaidlegal.com/go/ninacs

Click on the membership Info tab and then on the US flag to find your state. From there you can get info about the membership detail for the state you live in.

If Judi has already sent you info or to her website, please ignore this email.. I looked several digest down and didn't see any further info to/for you and thought you might like to explore it further.

Take care!!
Nina
